channel.title: home on Nomad
channel.description: Recent content in home on Nomad

item.title: NGC 2244/Caldwell 50
item.description: In search of dark skies or NGC 2244 “I have every useless thing in the world in my house there. The only thing wanting is the necessary thing, a great patch of open sky like this. Always try to keep a patch of sky above your life, little boy,” he added, turning to me. “You have a soul in you of rare quality, an artist’s nature; never let it starve for lack of what it needs.
